originalText.text: Paul is the best in the business for self tapes! Best quality, best equipment, invaluable guidance and direction, if you need it. He is my go to when available. His lighting, sound and editing are spot on every time. My agent loves  his tapes. Highly recommended! Plus he‚Äôs a really cool guy too. üëç

originalText.text: I‚Äôve taped auditions in many different studios in both in NYC and LA, and Paul was by far the best that I‚Äôve worked with.  For starters, he creates an environment that is welcoming and professional, and is very enthusiastic about his work ‚Äì he makes it fun.  When he reads the lines, he reads like an actor, and not just like a reader reading lines in a flat monotone.  The feedback he gives is both welcomed and very advantageous, and he delivered my final cut within an hour.  I would highly recommend working with him, and will continue to do so myself in the future.

originalText.text:
Paul is a Zen master, when you walk into his studio, you instantly feel comfortable. He is very welcoming.
He will work on your audition WITH you. He will offer suggestions to make your work the best it can be, without taking over your work. You will want to listen, because he has seen it all, and actors have booked work.
I enjoy taping my auditions with Paul, we game plan and his suggestions make my self tapes so good. You don't have to wait to get your work, he will upload to EcoCast for you, and email you your audition while you wait.
The quality of the video is excellent for the price. I would recommend buying your sessions in advance as you save money over buying one by one.
Happy auditioning, and good luck.

originalText.text: I'm so grateful for Paul and his amazing self tape service. He studio is very clean, cozy, and I feel very safe exploring and videotaping the pieces I submit for a variety of feature film, tv, and theatre projects. Paul works fast and the results help me look and sound the best I can! I highly recommend working with him and get ready to enjoy yourself!

originalText.text: Paul works like no other "self-taping" company I have ever used.  He is incredibly easy to work with and produces a great audition video.  He is detail oriented and prepared.  Great communicator.   Use him once and you will see...you will want to come back over and over.   All 5 stars well deserved!
